revolver 0.3.0
  • Reference

Extract phylogenetic or mutation trees for a patient

Phylo.Rd

Extract phylogenetic or mutation trees for a patient

Phylo(x, p, rank = NULL, data = "trees")

Arguments

x

a REVOLVER object of class "rev_cohort" or "rev_cohort_fit"
p

a patient
data

Either `trees` or `fit`.

Value

phylogenetic or mutation trees data for p

Examples

data(TRACERx_cohort)

# Get all the trees for a patient
Phylo(TRACERx_cohort, 'CRUK0002')
#> [[1]]
#>  [ REVOLVER tree - Ranked 1/3 
#>  ] 
#>

# Get a specific tree for a patient
Phylo(TRACERx_cohort, 'CRUK0002', rank = 2)
#>  [ REVOLVER tree - Ranked 2/3 
#>  ] 
#> 
#> # A tibble: 7 x 7
